parameter.name: MergeFileInOneActor
parameter.description: Exports parts, including multibody parts, as single actors. To export multibody parts as individual actors, clear this option.

parameter.name: ImportInstanceNames
parameter.description: Adds the instance names after the part name: #PN# (#IN#). #PN# and #IN# are also added as meta-properties so you can add annotations linked to these meta-properties.

parameter.name: ImportMetaProperties
parameter.description: Exports attributes such as part number (P/N), designation, and revision number. In Composer, meta-properties appear as user properties in the Properties pane.

parameter.name: ImportAsBodies
parameter.description: Exports parts as solid bodies.

parameter.name: ImportPoints
parameter.description: Exports point geometry.

parameter.name: ImportCurves
parameter.description: Exports curve geometry (curves, wires, wireframes).

parameter.name: ImportFreeFaces
parameter.description: Exports surface bodies (construction faces).

parameter.name: ImportHiddenComponents
parameter.description: Exports hidden parts in assemblies and bodies in multibody parts. The hidden components are stored in a selection set.

parameter.name: ImportPMIs
parameter.description: Exports Product and Manufacturing Information (PMI), also known as 3D tolerancing and annotations.
